tool_description: An API that gets truths, dares, truthsNSFW and daresNSFW for developers to create apps using this game
title: Truth Dare

api_list.name: Get Specific Number Of Dares NSFW
api_list.description: This endpoint will give you specific number of dares NSFW (ADULT)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://truth-dare.p.rapidapi.com/truthDareApi/dareNSFW/{daresnumbernsfw}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "truth-dare.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
